recipesJson.name: Creamy Cavendish
recipesJson.author: mgrimes
recipesJson.description:
A deliciously sweet vanilla pipe tobacco.
FA Cream Fresh is used to bond the Shisha Vanilla to the Soho creating a profile that sits nicely a top the Cavendish tobacco.

reviews.text: I'm kicking myself for only making 15ml of this. It is just wonderful. I had to sub USA Red Mix for the Cavendish but it worked well for me. I have the Cavendish in my wish list. Thanks mgimes!
Really love this recipe. The soho and vanilla give the cavendish a lot more of a well rounded flavor. I think it developed a lot more after the first week or two. Will try with FLV cream next time

Hell yeah.  This shit is delicious.  I have FA Cream Fresh but per Fear's comment I went with FLV Cream at the same %.  Im sure the profile is still the same though.  This one is definitely sweet and light on the tobacco, but it's perfect for me.  Thanks

To start off with, Cavendish is "flavored tobacco" depending on the tobacconist it can be any variation of tobaccos and flavorings but usually a mix of Kentucky, Virginia and Burley that have been treated, pressed then fermented. The flavorings are usually dark fruits, nuts and liquor. So you have a mellow smooth sweet tobacco that is flavored. Which is pretty much what INW Cavendish Type brings to the table. The addition of the caramel and vanilla are a welcome addition to this blend, as is the FA cream fresh I would like to have seen a thicker cream used here to pair with the INW Shisha Vanilla but not a negative by any means. I would like to also mention that vaping this has a distinct "room note" It is a pleasant "someone's grampa is smoking a pipe" kind of room note but does not linger forever. This is very much a "tobacco dominant" recipe, but also one that is accessible to desert tobacco lovers and non tobacco vapers as well. I cannot wait to see how this develops on a longer steep. Excellent recipe!
Not much to say. Just a simple yet damned good tobacco. Good work on this one mgrimes.

A real banger here. I mixed this up and at first taste its everything you want from a good vanilla pipe.Its got the smoothness of the Vanilla from the shisha and cream fresh that will only get smoother and help round out the cavendish from INW. To make a long story short I am not a normal tobacco vaper however this recipe may have changed my life..
